title: Romania infringed on transgender man's rights, EU's top court rules
content: Romanian authorities' refusal to recognise the gender identity of a British-Romanian transgender man violated his rights, the EU's top court ruled. Arian Mirzarafie-Ahi, who transitioned after gaining British citizenship, faced denial from Romania despite EU law mandating recognition without extra procedures. This ruling sets a significant precedent for transgender rights across the EU.
summary: Romanian authorities' refusal to recognise the gender identity of a British-Romanian transgender man violated his rights, the EU's top court ruled. Arian Mirzarafie-Ahi, who transitioned after gaining British citizenship, faced denial from Romania despite EU law mandating recognition without extra procedures. This ruling sets a significant precedent for transgender rights across the EU.

title: Two migrants dead, many injured after van crashes in Croatia
content: In central Croatia, an overloaded van with German numberplates carrying migrants crashed, resulting in two fatalities and several injuries after veering off the road. The passengers included citizens of Turkey and Middle Eastern countries. This incident follows another migrant transport accident in Croatia last month, highlighting the ongoing migrant crisis along the Balkan route.
summary: In central Croatia, an overloaded van with German numberplates carrying migrants crashed, resulting in two fatalities and several injuries after veering off the road. The passengers included citizens of Turkey and Middle Eastern countries. This incident follows another migrant transport accident in Croatia last month, highlighting the ongoing migrant crisis along the Balkan route.

title: 'Command centre used to plan attacks': Israel strikes Hezbollah fighters inside Lebanon mosque
content: The Israeli Defense Forces conducted targeted airstrikes on Hezbollah forces operating from a command center inside a mosque near Salah Ghandour Hospital in southern Lebanon. The strikes aimed to halt terrorist activities against Israel. Nine medical and nursing personnel were injured despite prior evacuation warnings.
summary: The Israeli Defense Forces conducted targeted airstrikes on Hezbollah forces operating from a command center inside a mosque near Salah Ghandour Hospital in southern Lebanon. The strikes aimed to halt terrorist activities against Israel. Nine medical and nursing personnel were injured despite prior evacuation warnings.

title: Antarctica turning green 'dramatically', trend accelerated over years, study finds
content: Antarctica's vegetation cover has grown significantly, increasing from less than a square kilometre to nearly 12 square kilometres between 1986 and 2021. The accelerated greening, driven by climate change and reduced sea-ice extent, highlights the rapid and concerning transformation of the Antarctic Peninsula's landscape, emphasizing the urgent need for further research and action to protect this vulnerable region.
summary: Antarctica's vegetation cover has grown significantly, increasing from less than a square kilometre to nearly 12 square kilometres between 1986 and 2021. The accelerated greening, driven by climate change and reduced sea-ice extent, highlights the rapid and concerning transformation of the Antarctic Peninsula's landscape, emphasizing the urgent need for further research and action to protect this vulnerable region.

title: Hezbollah says fires rockets at north Israel air base
'War needs to end': Kamala Harris meets Arab American leaders amid growing discontent over US support for Israel
content: VP Kamala Harris met Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan to address US support concerns for Israel. The session, important for her presidential campaign, saw community leaders expressing frustrations over the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. Harris emphasised peace efforts amidst criticism. The upcoming election underscores the significance of this demographic's support.
summary: VP Kamala Harris met Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan to address US support concerns for Israel. The session, important for her presidential campaign, saw community leaders expressing frustrations over the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. Harris emphasised peace efforts amidst criticism. The upcoming election underscores the significance of this demographic's support.

title: Elon Musk's X transfers $5.2 million in fines over Brazil ban to wrong bank account
content: Elon Musk’s platform X, banned by Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes over disinformation charges, mistakenly transferred $5.2 million in fines to the wrong account. Justice Moraes instructed the redirection of these funds. X, with 22 million Brazilian users, began blocking certain accounts and requested to lift the ban, which Moraes conditioned on paying pending fines.
summary: Elon Musk’s platform X, banned by Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes over disinformation charges, mistakenly transferred $5.2 million in fines to the wrong account. Justice Moraes instructed the redirection of these funds. X, with 22 million Brazilian users, began blocking certain accounts and requested to lift the ban, which Moraes conditioned on paying pending fines.

title: Hurricane Helene wreaks havoc on historic Biltmore Estate in North Carolina
content: Hurricane Helene caused significant damage to Asheville's Biltmore Estate. While the main buildings remained largely intact, low-lying areas and forested portions suffered substantial flooding, wind damage, and the loss of some animals. Initial assessments estimate the estate will be closed until at least October 15. Buncombe County faces extensive power outages and infrastructure damage.
summary: Hurricane Helene caused significant damage to Asheville's Biltmore Estate. While the main buildings remained largely intact, low-lying areas and forested portions suffered substantial flooding, wind damage, and the loss of some animals. Initial assessments estimate the estate will be closed until at least October 15. Buncombe County faces extensive power outages and infrastructure damage.

title: 'Terrible vice president': Old clips of Liz Cheney critiquing ‘radically liberal’ Kamala Harris resurface
content: Former Republican Representative Liz Cheney endorses Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris, marking a significant political shift. Cheney's father, former Vice President Dick Cheney, also aligns with Harris. Former President Donald Trump dismisses the endorsement, highlighting Cheney's prior criticisms of Harris.
summary: Former Republican Representative Liz Cheney endorses Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris, marking a significant political shift. Cheney's father, former Vice President Dick Cheney, also aligns with Harris. Former President Donald Trump dismisses the endorsement, highlighting Cheney's prior criticisms of Harris.

title: As Prince William's role in royal family grows, is Harry's chance for reconciliation slipping away?
content: King Charles III's cancer diagnosis has shifted royal dynamics, with Prince William taking on more responsibilities and Princess Kate stepping back. Prince Harry seeks reconciliation with his father amid concern over their strained relationship. While King Charles is open to mending ties, Prince William remains opposed, complicating Harry's desire for familial peace.
summary: King Charles III's cancer diagnosis has shifted royal dynamics, with Prince William taking on more responsibilities and Princess Kate stepping back. Prince Harry seeks reconciliation with his father amid concern over their strained relationship. While King Charles is open to mending ties, Prince William remains opposed, complicating Harry's desire for familial peace.

title: In Video: Sheriff points gun at Judge’s head moments before fatally shooting him in courthouse
content: District Judge Kevin Mullins was shot and killed in his courthouse chambers by longtime friend Sheriff Shawn Stines. Surveillance footage shows a heated exchange before Stines allegedly opened fire. The motive is under investigation, possibly linked to a sex scandal. Stines faces murder charges.
summary: District Judge Kevin Mullins was shot and killed in his courthouse chambers by longtime friend Sheriff Shawn Stines. Surveillance footage shows a heated exchange before Stines allegedly opened fire. The motive is under investigation, possibly linked to a sex scandal. Stines faces murder charges.

title: Ex-New York governor David Paterson, son assaulted during evening stroll
content: Former New York governor David Paterson and his stepson were attacked on the Upper East Side while walking their dog. The assailants, after being confronted for climbing a fire escape, inflicted head and facial injuries, prompting the duo to seek medical attention.
summary: Former New York governor David Paterson and his stepson were attacked on the Upper East Side while walking their dog. The assailants, after being confronted for climbing a fire escape, inflicted head and facial injuries, prompting the duo to seek medical attention.

title: Watch: Kamala Harris keeps on repeating '32 days' after 'teleprompter malfunctions'
content: During a rally in Flint, Michigan, Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris experienced a momentary lapse while referencing the number of days until the election, leading critics to speculate about a teleprompter malfunction. Despite this, Harris emphasized the tight race ahead and criticized former President Donald Trump's record on manufacturing jobs.
summary: During a rally in Flint, Michigan, Democratic Presidential nominee Kamala Harris experienced a momentary lapse while referencing the number of days until the election, leading critics to speculate about a teleprompter malfunction. Despite this, Harris emphasized the tight race ahead and criticized former President Donald Trump's record on manufacturing jobs.

title: Kamala Harris appears on 'Call Her Daddy' podcast to discuss abortion
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris appeared on Alex Cooper's podcast 'Call Her Daddy' to discuss reproductive rights in the US. The episode is aimed at engaging young female listeners, highlighting the significance of connecting with younger audiences. Harris' campaign emphasizes her media engagement focusing on social media reach and the cultural relevance of Cooper’s show.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris appeared on Alex Cooper's podcast 'Call Her Daddy' to discuss reproductive rights in the US. The episode is aimed at engaging young female listeners, highlighting the significance of connecting with younger audiences. Harris' campaign emphasizes her media engagement focusing on social media reach and the cultural relevance of Cooper’s show.

title: Amid deteriorating law and order, Pak PM Shehbaz Sharif to visit Khyber Pakhtunkhwa next week
content: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif plans to visit Khyber Pakhtunkhwa amid rising violence, aiming to tackle security issues urgently. Joined by Federal and Interior Ministers, he stressed immediate action to restore peace. Governor Kundi sought federal aid as opposition members criticized the provincial government for lawlessness and inadequate performance, urging parliamentary supremacy and constitutional adherence.
summary: Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif plans to visit Khyber Pakhtunkhwa amid rising violence, aiming to tackle security issues urgently. Joined by Federal and Interior Ministers, he stressed immediate action to restore peace. Governor Kundi sought federal aid as opposition members criticized the provincial government for lawlessness and inadequate performance, urging parliamentary supremacy and constitutional adherence.

title: 'Yep, totally my bad': Ohio teen admits to causing crash that killed 5, forced 500 to evacuate
content: A 17-year-old girl from Ohio confessed to causing a deadly crash involving a tanker truck carrying toxic ammonia in Illinois. The incident led to five fatalities and the evacuation of over 500 people. Dashcam footage confirmed she cut off the tanker while speeding, causing the catastrophic accident.
summary: A 17-year-old girl from Ohio confessed to causing a deadly crash involving a tanker truck carrying toxic ammonia in Illinois. The incident led to five fatalities and the evacuation of over 500 people. Dashcam footage confirmed she cut off the tanker while speeding, causing the catastrophic accident.

title: Flight slams brakes mid-takeoff to avoid collision with crossing plane: 'Stopped so quickly'
content: A London-bound Norse Atlantic Airways flight from JFK Airport aborted takeoff to avoid a collision with another plane, reaching 87 knots before braking. The incident, described as minor by the airline, caused a slight delay but no panic among passengers. The flight safely landed in London six hours later without further issues.
summary: A London-bound Norse Atlantic Airways flight from JFK Airport aborted takeoff to avoid a collision with another plane, reaching 87 knots before braking. The incident, described as minor by the airline, caused a slight delay but no panic among passengers. The flight safely landed in London six hours later without further issues.

title: Trump promotes fake JPMorgan CEO's endorsement, then denies involvement: 'I don't know'
content: Former President Trump faced backlash after promoting a false endorsement from JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Truth Social. JPMorgan's spokesperson quickly denied Dimon's support for Trump, and Dimon has confirmed his neutrality in the election. Trump claimed ignorance about the misleading post.
summary: Former President Trump faced backlash after promoting a false endorsement from JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon on Truth Social. JPMorgan's spokesperson quickly denied Dimon's support for Trump, and Dimon has confirmed his neutrality in the election. Trump claimed ignorance about the misleading post.

title: Trump says Israel should 'hit Iran's nuclear facilities first' days after Biden urges restraint
content: Donald Trump urged Israel to strike Iran's nuclear facilities after a missile attack, criticizing Joe Biden's restraint. Trump advocated for an aggressive response, while Biden emphasized proportional retaliation to avoid escalating conflict. Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu is evaluating potential responses, including symbolic or direct actions.
summary: Donald Trump urged Israel to strike Iran's nuclear facilities after a missile attack, criticizing Joe Biden's restraint. Trump advocated for an aggressive response, while Biden emphasized proportional retaliation to avoid escalating conflict. Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu is evaluating potential responses, including symbolic or direct actions.

title: Family of 4 among 18 people killed in Israeli air strike on West Bank: Report
content: An Israeli air strike in Tulkarm, West Bank, killed at least 18 people, including civilians and local leaders of Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad. The attack targeted Hamas leader accused of organizing attacks and supplying weapons. Rescue efforts continue amidst the devastation, with residents searching for missing loved ones.
summary: An Israeli air strike in Tulkarm, West Bank, killed at least 18 people, including civilians and local leaders of Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad. The attack targeted Hamas leader accused of organizing attacks and supplying weapons. Rescue efforts continue amidst the devastation, with residents searching for missing loved ones.
